Class Master

java.lang.Object
Master
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Master extends Object implements Runnable
This class operates as the generator of values for the input buffer for the MultithreadingRootFinder. "FM" is referring to "From Master"

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    run()
    creates the TripletGenerators and puts them into the "From Master" Circular Buffer, while also attempting to receive a String of roots to output from the "From Slave" Circular Buffer.

    • Master

      public Master(CircularBufferFM bufferFM, CircularBufferFS bufferFS, int polyCount)
      The multi argument constructor for Master takes in the following parameters:
      Parameters:
      bufferFM - used to send information between the Master and Slave
      bufferFS - used to send information between the Master and Slave
      polyCount - used to determine how many pairs of coefficients are made

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      creates the TripletGenerators and puts them into the "From Master" Circular Buffer, while also attempting to receive a String of roots to output from the "From Slave" Circular Buffer.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - in case of a runtime exception.
